example.parse: (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS استقبل) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الحكم)) (PP-MNR (PREP ب) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN اعصاب) (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN باردة))) (SBAR-TMP (SUB_CONJ بينما) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS اجهشت) (NP-SBJ (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM زوجت) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه))) (NP (NOUN_PROP عائشة))) (SBAR (WHNP-2 (REL_PRON التي)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS كانت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC جالسة) (PP (PREP في) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الصفوف) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الخلفية)) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN لمحكمة)))))))))) (PP-CLR (PREP في) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN البكاء))))))) (PUNC .))
